sen.j: 琉球神道記（りゅうきゅうしんとうき）は、仏書の一つ。
sen.e: Ryukyu Shinto-ki is one of Buddhism books.
Ryukyu Shinto-ki is a Buddhist books.
sen.cmt: Ryuku Shinto-ki にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。

sen.e: The books were released in the first year of the Keian era (1648).
The books were released in the first year of the Keian era (1648).
sen.cmt: the first year of the Keian era () を削除しました。

sen.e: The books were compiled by Taichu.
The books were compiled by Taichu.
The books were compiled by Taichu.

sen.j: 巻一の三界事から、琉球における仏教、神道の根源、由来を略説する。
sen.e: With the book I discussing the three Buddhism realms, the books elucidate the roots and origins of Buddhism and Shintoism in Ryukyu (Okinawa).
With first book discussing the three Buddhist realms, the books elucidate the roots and origins of Buddhism and Shintoism in Ryukyu (Okinawa).
With first book discussing the three Buddhist realms, the books elucidate the roots and origins of Buddhism and Shintoism in Ryukyu (Okinawa).
